drinkOne.name: Donkey Long (Island)
drinkOne.info: Refreshing touches of lime, ananas and the energy of bananas to kidnap princesses all night long!

drinkSix.name: Final Fanta
drinkSix.info: You think that you will have only one, but we have seen people asking for this one up to sixteen times!

drinkTwo.name: PikaPunch
drinkTwo.info: Feeling down? Need a a jolt of electricity to carry through the night? Spice it up with Pika punch!

drinkThree.name: Ganondrink
drinkThree.info: Soothing tones of liquor with an hit of orange, a deep warming voice that apparently means no harm...

drinkFour.name: Princess Peach
drinkFour.info: Sweet and tender, easy to love but strong. Drink three of these and you'll be food for Italian plumbers!

drinkFive.name: Sonic Spritz
drinkFive.info: GET FAST with the most energizing of the Spritzes! Blue curacao, kiwi and fresh mint to get you at high speeds!
